Cambridge.Hooper-Eliot House: The Hooper-Eliot House is an historic house at 25 Reservoir Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts. The three story Stick style house was built in 1872 for E.W. Hooper to a design by Sturgis & Brigham. The building's five-bay facade and gambrel roof form an early part of the effort by Sturgis to popularize the Georgian Revival.
